content: perfect for those chilly days this corner-to-corner crochet hat is a triumph and so much easier to make than it looks stylish and modern easy to wear great fun to make and with an unusual construction this hat is guaranteed to be a go-to pattern year after year in sizes from baby to large adult you can make one for the whole family to enjoy it s a great yarn stash buster and perfect for a quick and easy crochet gift this season *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern not a finished product **what s included** a ten-page pdf including written pattern and charts pattern support of you need or would like it colour charts for each size written colour changes for each size beginners corner to corner crochet tutorial full video tutorial difficulty is intermediate **materials and tools ** hook 4 5mm us g+ crochet hook yarn wool of the andes worsted by wecrochet 110yds/50g 2 2 3 4 balls in total please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal use to make and sell your finished items on a small scale credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at www hanjancrochet com and share my free patterns and tutorials with you -
